uniform_sql.sqlstring: select SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.IDMOV as "idMovimiento", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.TIPMOV, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.IDEXIST as "Id. Exist", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.IDART as "Artículo", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.IDMAC as "Id. MAC", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.IDPROV as "Id. Proveedor", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.LOTEPROV as "Lote Proveedor", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.LOTEINSP as "Lote Inspección", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.FECCAD as "Fec. Caducidad", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.OBSERV, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.ESTINI, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.ESTFIN, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI as "Cant. Inicial", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANFIN as "Cant. Final", DECODE (SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.TIPMOV, 'A',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI, 'B',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI * -1, 'D',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI, 'E',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI, -- No se usa ? 'F',0, -- Centro de coste 'G',0, 'H',0, 'I',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI - SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANFIN, 'L',0, 'M',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI - SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANFIN, 'O',0, 'P',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI - SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANFIN, 'Q',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI - SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANFIN, 'R',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI - SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANFIN, 'S',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI - SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANFIN, 'T',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI - SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANFIN, -- Traslado 999 ?? 'U',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI - SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANFIN, 'V',0, 'X',SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.CANINI * -1, 0) as "Cant. Movto.", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.ORIGEN as "Origen", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.DESTINO as "Destino", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.IDMUESTRAINI, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.IDMUESTRAFIN, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.IDDOC, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.IDLIN, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.TIPDOC, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.ERP, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.DESCTIPMOV as "Tip. Movto.", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.DESCRIP, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.DESCPROV, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.DESCESTINI, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.DESCESTFIN, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.DESCMUESTRAINI, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.DESCMUESTRAFIN, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.USUARIO as "Usuario", SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.UBICORI, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.UBICDES, SGAVHISTEXIST_10G.FECMOV as "Fec. Movto." from SGAVHISTEXIST_10G

query_jdbc.description: No está ordenado, ordenar una vez aplicado el filtro

query_object.select: select expanded Name to string,Salary to double,StartDate to timeInstant,Address.City to string,Address.State to string

query_xml.select: select location as "Location" to string,revenue as "Revenue" to integer,rating as "Rating" to integer

uniform_sql.sqlstring: select SGA_REF_CODES.RV_LOW_VALUE as "Valor", SGA_REF_CODES.RV_MEANING as "Descripción" from SGA_REF_CODES where SGA_REF_CODES.RV_DOMAIN = 'TIPMOV' order by SGA_REF_CODES.RV_LOW_VALUE asc

select SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.OPERARI, SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.DATA, SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.QUART, decode(substr(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.ORIDES, 1, 7),'Picking', substr(sgavmovsusuariresum.orides, 11), 'Puesto ', substr(sgavmovsusuariresum.orides, 8), sgavmovsusuariresum.orides) as "ORIGEN/DESTI", sum(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.MOVIMENTS) as MOVIMENTS, sum(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.ENTRADES) AS ENTRADES, sum(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.SORTIDES) AS SORTIDES, sum(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.REGULAR) AS REGULAR from SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM group by sgavmovsusuariresum.operari, sgavmovsusuariresum.data, sgavmovsusuariresum.quart, decode(substr(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.ORIDES, 1, 7),'Picking', substr(sgavmovsusuariresum.orides, 11), 'Puesto ', substr(sgavmovsusuariresum.orides, 8), sgavmovsusuariresum.orides)

select SGAHISTAVERIA.IDTRASLO as "TRASLO", SGAHISTAVERIA.CREATEDON as "DATA", SGAHISTAVERIA.TEMPS as "DURACIÓ", SGAHISTAVERIA.ESTADO as "ESTAT", SGAHISTAVERIA.UBIORI as "UBI.ORIGEN", SGAHISTAVERIA.UBIDES as "UBI.DESTÍ", SGAHISTAVERIA.IDORD as "ORDRE", SGAHISTAVERIA.PASILLOACTUAL as "PAS.ORIGEN", SGAHISTAVERIA.PASILLODESTINO as "PAS.DESTÍ", SGAHISTAVERIA.POSUBIORI as "POS.UBI.ORIGEN", SGAHISTAVERIA.POSUBIDES as "POS.UBI.DESTÍ", 'TRASLO '||SGAHISTAVERIA.IDTRASLO AS "DESCTRASLO", DECODE(SGAHISTAVERIA.ESTADO, 'A', 'AVERIA', 'FUNCIONAMENT') as "DESCESTAT" from SGAHISTAVERIA

query_ejb.description: get a list of all prices

uniform_sql.sqlstring: select idtraslo, operacio, passadis, costat, profunditat, alcada, posubi, picking, fecfin, temps, estado from (select t.idtrasloini idtraslo, 'Extracció' operacio, u.pasillo passadis, u.lado costat, u.columna profunditat, u.nivel alcada, t.posubiori posubi, udes.descrip picking, t.fecfin fecfin, round((t.fecfin - t.createdon) * 60 * 24,2) temps, t.estado from sgahistordtran t, sgaubicacion u, sgaubicacion udes where t.ubiori = u.idubi and udes.idubi = t.ubidesfin and u.pasillo in (1, 2, 3, 4) and t.idtrasloini != 0 union select t.idtraslofin, 'Depósit', u.pasillo passadis, u.lado costat, u.columna profunditat, u.nivel alcada, t.posubidesfin, uori.descrip, t.fecfin, round((t.fecfin - t.createdon) * 60 * 24,2) temps, t.estado from sgahistordtran t, sgaubicacion u, sgaubicacion uori where t.ubidesfin = u.idubi and uori.idubi = t.ubiori and u.pasillo in (1, 2, 3, 4) and t.idtraslofin != 0) order by idtraslo,fecfin asc

query_xml.select: select name.lastname as 'Last Name',name.firstname as 'First Name',location.city as 'City',location.state as 'State',location.zip as 'Zip'
query_xml.description: Find all employees with above average scores

query_corba.select: select account_no as 'Account',type as 'Type',balance as 'Balance',customer.ssn as 'SS#',customer.first_name as 'First Name',customer.last_name as 'Last Name',customer.city as 'City',customer.state as 'State',customer.phone as 'Phone'

uniform_sql.sqlstring: select a.idartif article, a.descrip descripcio, m.idmac contenidor, u.pasillo passadis, u.lado costat, u.columna profunditat, u.nivel alcada, e.cantot cantot from sgaexistencia e, sgaarticulo a, sgamac m, sgaubicacion u where e.idart = a.idart and e.idmac = m.idmac and u.idubi = m.ubipos and a.idtipmac != 'CUB' and a.idart in (select idart from sgaexistencia having count(*) >2 group by idart) order by idartif, u.pasillo

query_xml.select: select vacation_accrued to string,vacation_used to string,personal_days_allowed,personal_days_used,comp_days_issued to string,comp_days_used to string,@id to string

query_ejb.description: find all products above the average price

query_soap.select: select expanded contact as "Name" to string,address as "Address" to string,city as "City" to string,state as "State" to string

uniform_sql.sqlstring: select SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.OPERARI, SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.DATA, substr(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.ORIDES, 11) as "ORIGEN/DESTI", sum(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.MOVIMENTS) as "MOVIMENTS", SUM(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.ENTRADES) as "ENTRADES", SUM(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.SORTIDES) as "SORTIDES", SUM(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.REGULAR) as "REGULAR" from SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM group by SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.OPERARI, SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.DATA, substr(SGAVMOVSUSUARIRESUM.ORIDES, 11)

query_xml.select: select location as "Location",employees as "Employees" to string,onsite_mfr as "Onsite Manufacturing" to string,square_footage as "Square Footage"
select name.lastname as 'Last Name',name.firstname as 'First Name',location.city as 'City',location.state as 'State'

uniform_sql.sqlstring: select 'Lliure' Estat, poslibre Total from sgavestadomld union select 'Ocupats', posocup from sgavestadomld union select 'Reservats', posres from sgavestadomld

query_xml.select: select name,company,premium to string,office_visit to string,deductible,out_of_pocket_limit,presc_drugs,dental to string,vision,emerg_room to string,outpatient_surgery to string,physical_therapy to string,home_health_care to string,@id to string

uniform_sql.sqlstring: select posicions, poslibre, poslibrenomes1, posocup, posres, pocupacio, cubvacpos1, cubvacpos2lluire, cubvacpos2tapat from sgavestadomld

query_xml.select: select location as "Location" to string,revenue as "Revenue" to integer,rating as "Rating" to integer
select name.firstname as 'First Name',name.lastname as 'Last Name',birthday as 'Birthday',salary as 'Salary',location.city as 'City',location.state as 'State'
query_xml.description: all employees with results converted to a table
